reason: Planning complete: replaced minimal plan with phased implementation/review/test roadmap for Replay Diagnostics UX.

next_steps: Execute Phase 3 implementation steps (indices 2-7) with additive optional explainability contract changes only.
Preserve JSON/Markdown/annotation backward compatibility while adding low-noise explainability metadata.

risks: Confidence heuristics could increase noise if thresholds are too permissive.
Annotation enrichment could affect downstream parsers if prefix format drifts.
Path portability normalization may unintentionally change expected artifact references.
dependencies: Build/test validation should use registered scripts in test-run readiness phase.
data.rationale: Executor is the correct next agent to implement the now-defined additive diagnostics UX architecture before Reviewer and Tester gates.
